name: Shaman (kraksnax)
description:
Classic shoot-em-up action for the COMMODORE 64 with some unseen elements or features included that only those who possess the shaman's eye shall discover.

A new rendition, ever-so-lightly modded of old classic vertical shooter from those rambunctious fellas ay Kraksnak Ltd along with a tasty intro screen to boot. See screenshots and video play.
